item.description:
Hey guys...thanks to all who came out to bowl last night it was a great time.
This time around we are going to try something different.....Karoakee. Don't worry if you are a chicken like me you will not have to sing. Anyways Sky is a very nice restaurant in Sudbury MA and they have Karoakee every Thursday night starting at 9. They have a full menu and of course great drinks.
I have been many time and it is always fun. Please RSVP quickly b/c the place gets packed and it is hard to get tables. If I know in advance how many people to expect I will try and reserve tables. Please RSVP even if you cannot come. Thanks and I hope to see you all there.
item.name: Karoakee if you dare....
